Addendum to AvSec Order No. 02/2024 dated 23.1.2024

Subject:-Quick Reaction Team (QRT) for Airports of India.

In exercise of powers conferred under rule 62 (1) of the Aircraft (Security)
Rules, 2023, Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation Security, for the purpose of
the safety and security of passengers, crew, ground personnel and general public
in all matters relating to safeguarding against acts of unlawful interference with civil
aviation, directs for partial modification of AvSec Order No. 02/2024 dated
23.1.2024 on the subject matter.

2, Serial Nos 11, 12, 13 and 14 of AvSec Order No.02/2024 shall be read as 10, 11,
12 and 13 respectively.

3. The words ‘Support Dett’ mentioned in serial No. 11 of Appendix-B of AvSec Order
No 02/2024 shall! be substituted with the words ‘Radio Operator’.

4. All other provision mentioned in AvSec Order No. 02/2024 dated 23.1.2024 shall
remain unchanged. The above amendments shall be implemented with immediate
effect.

5. This is issued with the approval of the DG, BCAS
